MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:15pm to safely complete repairs on our overhead line network near Pinwherry and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:45pm on Tuesday, 09 March 2021
